page.title: 19SUMMARY
page.content: Although Woodhall Spa is located in an agricultural area the population is by no means agricultural in its work with many people in fact being commuters to local towns.The village has a short history during which the spa itself was born,flourished and has now died. The spa has left its mark and there are now a number of hotels and other recreational facilities dating back to its heyday.An officer is now employed to publicise the other attractions of the area. In the future services in the village are likely to remain good although the number of people with cars may lead to a trend towards travelling elsewhere to shop.There are plans afoot to build more houses in the village,but these are likely to be aimed at the commuter sector of the market.
